entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster024
entry.content:
Nov 24, 13:48 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 16/11/2023 01:55 UTC
End time : 16/11/2023 08:32 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue on room G263 in GRA2

On 16/11/2023 at 01:55 UTC, room G263 of the Graveline datacenter (GRA2) experienced an electrical incident that may have impacted your services. The intervention of our technical teams enabled you to return your services in the morning (16/11 at 08:32 UTC).
We then secured the infrastructure by making the system redundant.
The services are once again in nominal operation.

Nov 16, 10:22 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 16/11/2023 01:55 UTC
Service impact : We have some hosts unreachable
Root cause : due to this incident: https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/sdv7r15bh9lf
Ongoing actions :

Nov 16, 05:53 UTC
Update - After a fix implemented by our technical teams, the situation is gradually returning to normal.

Nov 16, 04:12 UTC
Identified - Start time : 16/11/2023 01:55 UTC
Service impact : We have some hosts unreachable due to this incident: https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/sdv7r15bh9lf
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on a fix, and an update will be posted as soon as significant progress has been made.

This is linked to the loss of a backbone link from our provider in ÃŽle-de-France which creates saturation on our network and causes a degradation of your services.
The provider's teams are on site to locate the fault.
